TopicTitle: KSP1.04+RSS + Alcor + RPM .. MFD Navball Anomaly in Alcor capsule ?

Articles.Content:
Just wondering is anyone else has had this 'anomaly'

All other MFDs look fine... except the navball, which doesn't appear and the mask is at the wrong scale.

I've gone through the files and all looks the same as KSP1.02 which is working fine..

![xR8tX4i.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/xR8tX4i.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-06T21:06:24Z" title="07/06/2015 09:06  PM" data-short="9 yr">July 6, 2015</time> by sumghai**
  
Marked as solved

JSI RPM has just been updated to 0.21.0, and according to [the release notes](https://github.com/Mihara/RasterPropMonitor/wiki/Changes-in-this-version), the PFD (navball) configs have been changed, such that existing displays won't work properly.

You'll just have to wait for Alexustas to update his ALCOR pod IVA.

Ah.. thanks

I must have missed that in my excitement... !

![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
